Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 24th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1979...
Injured on 5/3/1980 with a Dislocated Finger, out for one week...
Traded from New York (N) to Pittsburgh on 2/5/1981 (Going to PIT: 1B K. Hrbek, RF V. Hayes, CF G. Redus, P B. Holton. Going to NYM: LF G. Matthews Sr., RF H. Kadota, P T. Johnson)...
Had first career hit on 5/6/1983, off Ray Corbin (HOU)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/10/1983, off Dan Petry (PHI)...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 5/6/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1988, hitting .419 with 2 HR, 12 RBI...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Houston on 7/15/1988...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/2/1989 to a 3-year deal worth $15,000,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Oakland on 7/12/1990...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/12/1992 to a 5-year deal worth $5,510,000 per year...
Injured on 4/1/1992 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1992, hitting .429 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1995, hitting .476 with 4 HR, 13 RBI...
Injured on 9/22/1995 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for one week...
